---
title: "09 | Great(ness, er)"
author: "C.O."
date: "September 2024"
draft: false
---

"Great" is often used to characterize something or someone that is outstanding! The LORD is referred to as mighty, marvelous and awesome: all synonyms of "great." All of these words definitely describe HIM, and they may also describe HIS creation!

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Job 37:23
-   Week 2
    -   Joel 2:21
-   Week 3
    -   Matthew 18:1-5
-   Week 4
    -   Psalms 95:3-4
